categories: Category:Ships of the Open Circle Fleet

nodes.text: The Negotiator was a Venator-class Star Destroyer of the Galactic Republic naval forces' Open Circle Fleet, and served as the flagship of Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi and his task force during the Clone Wars. The Star Destroyer fought in many battles throughout the war, such as the Battle of Christophsis, the Battle of the Kaliida Nebula and a Separatist ambush on Kenobi's fleet, which resulted in the destruction of the Negotiator and much of the task force.

A Venator-class Star Destroyer, the Negotiator had two command bridges and was equipped with a hyperdrive generator. The Star Destroyer was also equipped with escape pods and was armed with eight DBY-827 heavy turbolaser turrets (four port, four starboard) and two medium dual turbolaser cannons (one port, one starboard), as well as a self-destruct mechanism. Inside its dorsal hangar bay, the Negotiator carried several Low Altitude Assault Transport/infantry gunships, BTL-B Y-wing starfighter/bombers and clone Z-95 Headhunters. Either side of the Negotiator's hull featured the emblem of the Open Circle Fleet.

In 22 BBY, during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the planet Christophsis was invaded by the Separatist Droid Army under the command of Kerkoiden General Whorm Loathsom and Sith assassin Asajj Ventress due to the planet's resources and position along the Corellian Run. Following the Separatist invasion, a blockade of thirty warships was established in the planet's orbit under Harch Admiral Trench to prevent Republic interference. Sometime later, the Republic dispatched a fleet under the command of Jedi General Anakin Skywalker to break through the blockade and deliver relief supplies to Senator Bail Organa, who was trapped on the surface as a result of the blockade. However, Skywalker and his fleet were ordered to retreat behind the moon of Leesis by Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, who arrived in the system aboard the Negotiator.

After their retreat, Skywalker left his flagship for the Negotiator, where he was greeted by Kenobi. While on board, Kenobi showed Skywalker a prototype stealth ship, with which the latter would use to continue the supply run to Senator Organa. Leaving the Negotiator aboard the stealth ship, Skywalker instead held off his mission and went on the offensive, resulting in the destruction of Trench's flagship, which sent the remaining Separatist warships into disarray as Kenobi, aboard the Negotiator, and the remaining Republic forces resumed their attack.
